docs.title: MkDocs
docs.text:
• Installation
  • Formatierung

docs.title: MkDocs ist eine Software zum erstellen von Dokumentationen.
docs.text: Diese Seite wurde mit MkDocs erstellt.

docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Admonitions
docs.text: Example of an admonition/callout with a title:

docs.title: https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/reference/annotations/
docs.text:
Title of the callout

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nulla et euismod nulla. Curabitur feugiat, tortor non consequat finibus, justo purus auctor massa, nec semper lorem quam in massa.

Collapsible callout:

docs.title: Code examples
docs.text:
An example of a codeblock for Python:

add_numbers.py
# Function to add two numbers
def add_two_numbers(num1, num2):
    return num1 + num2

# Example usage
result = add_two_numbers(5, 3)
print('The sum is:', result)

Example codeblock for JavaScript with lines highlighted:

concatenate_strings.js
// Function to concatenate two strings
function concatenateStrings(str1, str2) {
  return str1 + str2;
}

// Example usage
const result = concatenateStrings("Hello, ", "World!");
console.log("The concatenated string is:", result);

docs.title: Content Tabs
docs.text: This is some examples of content tabs.

docs.title: Generic Content
docs.text:
Plain textUnordered listOrdered list

This is some plain text

  • First item
  • Second item
  • Third item
  1. First item
  2. Second item
  3. Third item

docs.title: Code Blocks in Content Tabs
Flowcharts
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Failure?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Investigate...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Success!];

docs.title: Sequence Diagrams
docs.text:
sequenceDiagram
  autonumber
  Server->>Terminal: Send request
  loop Health
      Terminal->>Terminal: Check for health
  end
  Note right of Terminal: System online
  Terminal-->>Server: Everything is OK
  Terminal->>Database: Request customer data
  Database-->>Terminal: Customer data

docs.title: Infoboxen
docs.text:
Hinweis

Text

!!! note "Hinweis"
    Text

Abstract

Text

!!! abstract "Abstract"
    Text

Info

Text

!!! info "Info"
    Text

Tipp

Text

!!! tip "TIPP"
    Text

Erfolg

Text

!!! success "Erfolg"
    Text

Frage

Text

!!! question "Frage"
    Text

Warnung

Text

!!! warning "Warnung"
    Text

Versagen

Text

!!! failure "Versagen"
    Text

Gefahr

Text

!!! danger "Gefahr"
    Text

Bug

Text

!!! bug "Bug"
    Text

Beispiel

Text

!!! example "Beispiel"
    Text

Zitat

Text

!!! quote "Zitat"
    Text

Ohne Boxbeschreibung

!!! info ""
    Ohne Boxbeschreibung
Ausklappbar

Text

??? info "Ausklappbar"
    Text
Ausklappbar

Ausklapbar voreingest. ausgeklappt

???+ info "Ausklappbar"
    Ausklappbar voreingest. ausgeklappt
